text: Phawuloossayne Barinabassay babbontta xalateththan “Xoossa qaalay kooyiro intes hasa7istanas beeses. Shin inte qaala leqqidista. Intes merina deyooy beesonttayssa interkka inte bolla piriddida gish hai nuni gede ayhude gidoontta deretakko baana koyees. Qassekka Goday nuna “ass attiza ogge biitta gaxxa gaththana mala ta nena Ayhuda gidonta deretas poo7o histta kittadis gi azazides” gida.
